domelements.name: introeditor[text]
domelements.new_value: Please submit a short essay on the given topic. Your essay will be graded on a scale of 0–5.
domelements.explanation: This provides the students with clear instructions for the assignment.

domelements.name: grade[modgrade_type]
domelements.explanation: The grading type is set to 'scale' to allow for a 0–5 grading system.

domelements.name: grade[modgrade_scale]
domelements.explanation: This sets the grading scale to 0–5, as requested by the teacher.

domelements.name: assignsubmission_onlinetext_enabled
domelements.explanation: Online text submission is enabled to allow students to submit their essays directly.

domelements.name: assignsubmission_file_enabled
domelements.explanation: File submissions are disabled to keep the assignment simple and focused on online text submissions.

domelements.name: assignsubmission_onlinetext_wordlimit_enabled
domelements.explanation: Word limit is enabled to set a maximum word count for the essay.

domelements.name: assignsubmission_onlinetext_wordlimit
domelements.explanation: A word limit of 500 is suggested to keep the essays concise and manageable for grading.

domelements.name: duedate[enabled]
domelements.explanation: The due date is enabled to ensure students know when the assignment is due.

domelements.name: alwaysshowdescription
domelements.explanation: The description will always be visible to students, providing clarity about the assignment requirements.
